function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Industry demand for strategies to mitigate viral transmission due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission and outbreak in built environments","Mitigation":"Implement data-driven strategies to mitigate viral transmission, build trust, and create healthy environments for all occupants","Technologies":"Data-driven strategies, building design and ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building operators, health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient strategies to minimize the spread of infectious respiratory diseases","Impact":"Potential spread of infectious respiratory diseases such as influenza and legionnaires' disease","Mitigation":"Implement specific strategies to minimize the spread of infectious respiratory diseases, and promote behavioral changes among occupants","Technologies":"Behavioral change programs, building design and ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building operators, health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of optimization of natural resources and indoor environments in built infrastructure","Impact":"Negative environmental and human health consequences, suboptimal indoor environments for building occupants","Mitigation":"Optimize the use of natural resources, promote regenerative and restorative strategies, and improve indoor environments for building occupants","Technologies":"Resource optimization technologies, regenerative and restorative strategies, indoor environmental quality technologies","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building operators, environmental organizations"}]}
